name: An Epic!: Stickman World
description:
YOU CANT ESCAPE YOUR FATE, ITS DONE. About this game!

AE: SW is a game made by an unkown person where you can hang out with people and play games... as stickmans,

But then, it vanished from all stores for no reason.

Luckily enough, someone found a copy of the game and decided to play it.
